member.name: T:Models.AllVotes
member.summary: Model outlining the structure of an AllVotes object

member.name: P:Models.AllVotes.VoteID
member.summary: Unique id for this voting "session"

member.name: P:Models.AllVotes.VoteName
member.summary: User readable name of the vote

member.name: P:Models.AllVotes.IsClosed
member.summary: Used to check if this specific vote is closed

member.name: P:Models.AllVotes.IsFinished
member.summary: Used to check if this specific vote is finished

member.name: P:Models.AllVotes.YesVotes
member.summary: Number of 'yes' choices for this vote

member.name: P:Models.AllVotes.NoVotes
member.summary: Number of 'no' choices for this vote

member.name: P:Models.AllVotes.RequiredRole
member.summary: User is only allowed to participate in this specific vote, if it has the role found here associated with it

member.name: P:Models.AllVotes.AbsentionVotes
member.summary: Number of 'absention' choices for this vote

member.name: P:Models.AllVotes.OneVote
member.summary: Virtal, EF related prop containing all the associated votes (OneVotes)

member.name: P:Models.AllVotes.voteGroup
member.summary: Identifies which voting group does this current vote belongs to.

member.summary: Model used during user logins

member.summary: The email address of the user

member.summary: Unique id for each specific vote

member.summary: Gets or sets which voting event does this specific vote belong to.

member.summary: Marks which vote group does this specific vote belongs to

member.name: P:Models.OneVote.submitterName
member.summary: Email address of the user who submitted the vote.

member.name: P:Models.OneVote.Choice
member.summary: (Nullable bool!) Gets or sets what this user's choice was. true = yes; false = no, NULL = absention (vagy tartózkodott, fene se tudja hogy van árgyélusul)

member.name: P:Models.OneVote.AllVotes
member.summary: Virtual EF related prop, containing the allVotes associated with this OneVote

member.summary: IdentityUser object

member.summary: JWT token granted to the user
